title: Daggers
content:
of the Outlaw Rogue

Artificial Leech

Hand Me My Leech: Equips the Surgeon with a bloated, biting leech, allowing him to cast Leech.

Lethal Leech: Suckle a foe with hundreds of piercing teeth, making them Bleed.

Assassin's Touch

Weapon Enchantment +1

Deathly Slumber: Deals an additional 1~4 Necrotic Damage to creatures that are Knocked Out or Sleeping.

Goblinbane Dagger

Weapon Enchantment +1

Goblin's Undoing: Goblins have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against the wielder.

Weapon Enchantm
